scripts.dist-staging: ng build --configuration=staging && cp src/static/manifest.yml src/static/Staticfile dist/puzzleofmylifeapp
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run dist-staging && git push && cd dist/puzzleofmylifeapp && ibmcloud logout && ibmcloud login --apikey dpapE6Mzn---BY1AvElfe113lapgo0XeRKSh_-37uLfi && ibmcloud target --cf && ibmcloud app push 'Puzzle Frontend Web Staging' -n puzzle-frontend-staging && ibmcloud logout
scripts.dist-prod: ng build --prod && cp src/static/manifest.yml src/static/Staticfile dist/puzzleofmylifeapp
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run dist-prod && git push && cd dist/puzzleofmylifeapp && ibmcloud logout && ibmcloud login --apikey dpapE6Mzn---BY1AvElfe113lapgo0XeRKSh_-37uLfi && ibmcloud target --cf && ibmcloud app push 'Puzzle Frontend Web Production' -n puzzle-frontend-production && ibmcloud logout
